revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=DirecTV |model=DCAW1R1-01 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/08/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=STB bridge |fcc_id=NKR-DTVDCCKII,NKR-DTVDCCK |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=AMCC |cpu1_model=PowerPC 405EX;AMCC, PowerPC, GE16, TAIWAN, PPC405EX; |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29GL128ELT2I-90G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=DirecTV DCAW1R0-01 Wireless Module |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi1_chip1_brand=Lantiq |wi1_chip1_model=PSB 8231;PSB8231EL, V1.1, XWAY WAVE300, HE224, TNFG980R00; |wi1_chip2_brand=Lantiq |wi1_chip2_model=PSB 8301;PSB 8301 V, V1.1, XWAY WAVE300, K96864.1, GE033; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E8040 |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=2.4/5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SE5502L;SiGe, 5502L, 110AC;3; ,,, MoCA 2.0 controller;Entropic Communications;;1; |flags=manual GPL request needed |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=30:14:4A |oui_eth=30:14:4A }} This unit would seem to be a part of the (newer) '''DirecTV''' ''Cinema Connection Kit''. :It may not have been released yet.
"48J7151C.SGE" and "2013/04/17" is silkscreened on the back of the WAVE300 :mPCIe module in the FCC photos.
An unknown '''Marvell''' Ethernet chip is used.. it looks like 88E8020-NNC2, but there :are no google results for the P/N.. possibly 88E8040-NNC2 (Yukon FE+)?
{{WiFiCert|WFA20403|09/20/2013}}
